identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
core_principles: Mobile-First Tactility: Design for thumbs, not cursors.
RTL-Native: Arabic is not an afterthought; it drives the layout.
Visual Clarity: High contrast for supermarket aisles (glare-proof).

typography.instructions: Use Cairo for all headings to give a modern Arabic geometric feel. Use Tajawal for body text as it has excellent legibility at small sizes for list items.

colors.usage: Primary color (Emerald) is used for checkboxes, FABs, and active states. Backgrounds are tinted Slate (Cool Grey) to feel crisp. Avoid pure black in dark mode.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-4 (16px) as minimum container padding. Use p-6 for cards.
layout.radius: rounded-xl (12px) for cards, rounded-full for buttons
layout.rtl_strategy: CRITICAL: Use Tailwind Logical Properties. Use 'ms-' (margin-start), 'me-' (margin-end), 'ps-' (padding-start), 'pe-' (padding-end), 'start-' (inset-start), 'end-' (inset-end). DO NOT use left/right unless absolutely necessary for physical direction.
layout.grid_strategy: Mobile: Single column (grid-cols-1). Desktop: Masonry or Bento Grid for lists (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6).

list_item.style: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all rounded-xl p-4 flex items-center gap-4
list_item.interaction: Swipe-to-action capable (use framer-motion drag). Checkbox on 'start' side.
list_item.typography: Item name in Tajawal Medium. Quantity in a badge/pill.

fab.style: fixed bottom-6 end-6 size-14 rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-lg hover:bg-primary/90 flex items-center justify-center z-50

bottom_nav.style: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-border h-16 flex items-center justify-around z-40 lg:hidden

inputs.style: h-12 bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg text-lg px-4

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80' for sticky headers and bottom nav.
visual_enhancers.empty_states: Use minimalist illustrations. Center aligned text with muted foreground.

empty_list.usage: Empty state for when user has no lists

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for text. Use Slate-900 for text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.rtl: Ensure keyboard navigation flows correctly in RTL mode.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'src/index.css' immediately.
2. SETUP RTL: Add 'dir=rtl' to the html tag in 'public/index.html' by default (or handle dynamically).
3. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors and borderRadius defined above.
4. USE LOGICAL PROPERTIES: When writing Tailwind classes, REPLACE 'ml-4' with 'ms-4', 'pr-4' with 'pe-4', 'left-0' with 'start-0', etc.
5. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'Layout.js' component that handles the bottom nav (mobile) and sidebar (desktop).
6. USE SHADCN: Customize Shadcn components in 'components/ui' to match the radius and colors.
7. EMPTY STATES: Use the provided image URLs for empty states.
8. PWA: Register service worker in 'index.js' (if not already) and ensure 'manifest.json' exists.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
